snippet: Investigators say that Deputy Daniel Fanning of Wilson County was showing his weapons to a relative in a bedroom of his Lebanon home on Saturday when the boy picked up a gun off the bed.
lead_paragraph: Investigators say that Deputy Daniel Fanning of Wilson County was showing his weapons to a relative in a bedroom of his Lebanon home on Saturday when the boy picked up a gun off the bed.

headline.seo: Tennessee: Boy, 4, Finds Gun and Kills Deputy’s Wife
headline.main: Tennessee: Boy, 4, Finds Gun and Kills Deputy’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Boy, 4, Finds Gun and Kills Deputy’s Wife
